Title: Slabtown
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Matthew Negrete, Channing Powell
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Steven Yeun, Lauren Cohan
Plot: After being separated from Daryl, Beth finds herself in Grady Memorial Hospital in Atlanta, now controlled by what's left of the police force.
